content: In prepared remarks today, I will share a bit about what attracted me to Berkeley Lights, some of my initial business priorities, top line financial results for the first quarter, and our progress against our partnership milestones and workflow advancement. Revenue for the first quarter was $20.2 million, reflecting year-over-year growth of 8.5% and in line with expectations communicated by our team during the last earnings call. Total revenue for the first quarter 2022 was $20.2 million, up 8.5% year-over-year, North America accounted for 68% of total revenue, followed by Asia Pacific at 25% and EMEA at 7%. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
